post.description: Retrieves documents based on semantic search criteria. You can filter the results using various parameters such as query, offset, limit, country, document type, language, start date, and end date. You can also search for neighbor documents of a given document.

sessionAuth.name: acclab_platform-session
sessionAuth.description: The platform session cookie. If it represents a logged in user with the appropriate rights the search will expand to all possible documents instead of just public ones.

tokenAuth.name: token
tokenAuth.description: A token to allow protected operations.
